title: The Alphabet Game, Part One: A to E
description: This is the beginning of The Alphabet Game story, Part One: A to J ...It is the first in a series of four novellas, to be released monthly (April-July, 2014).Please note, because this is a serial, ALL of these novellas are NOT stand-alone and ALL (but the finale, book 4) have cliffhanger endings ...b>Stella Mulroney is playing a game.It's taken her two years -- but she finally has an interview at Gregory & Sons, the top London law firm that looks after her stepfather's interests. She plans to discover what her multi-millionaire stepdaddy really invests in and bring him down.Unwittingly, she's caught the attention of Gabriel 'Gabe' Gregory, son of her stepfather's top lawyer. He wants to know why Stella has such a need for revenge -- and would prefer to see her channel that fury into a game of his own -- 'The Alphabet Game'. After all, his game is so -- much more fun to play â€¦ *** ** ** ***Read all four parts of The Alphabet Game serial: The Alphabet Game, Part One: A to EThe Alphabet Game, Part Two: F to KThe Alphabet Game, Part Three: L to RThe Alphabet Game, Part Four: S to X, Y, Z
author: Andie M. Long
